item.title: OpsTalk Meetup #7 - Riemann workshop
item.description: Opstalk 7th monthly meetup is getting close, this time we’re going to have a Riemann workshop The meetup is due to take place on Thursday, March 13, 2014 For more info & RSVP please visit the meetup’s page
